thread.title: Brilliant. Welcoming and convenient.
thread.title_full: Brilliant. Welcoming and convenient. - Review of Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PDS789
title: Brilliant. Welcoming and convenient.
text:
I loved this place. Arrived really early but was given a room immediately, which was a godsend after a 27 hour trip.
Wonderfully helpful staff and the place is so central too.
Thank you for everything.
Will definitely stay again when visiting Paris.
